metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40145 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** gdImageGd2Ptr in gd_gd2.c in the GD Graphics Library (aka LibGD) through 2.3.2 has a double free. NOTE: the vendor's position is "The GD2 image format is a proprietary image format of libgd. It has to be regarded as being obsolete, and should only be used for development and testing purposes."

notes.Note: mdeslaur> php uses the system libgd2

criterions.comment: libgd2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
